channel.title: Posts on GoWi.Fi
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on GoWi.Fi

item.title: The doors are open!
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: We have been working around the clock to have our e-shop working, get an instruction video ready and build a nicer front page. We hope we have managed to do that, you will be our judge, but don’t be to harsh. Static website generators and Snipcart We built our website with our favorite website builder Appernetic.io that use the static website generator Hugo. To make the e-shop we have used Snipcart.

item.title: New 3D printed frames
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: New frames for the gowifi signs are 3d printed. The latest one in yellow and white. Here is one in PLA wood plastic hanged on the wall.
